title: 10-step emergency plan
author: VD
content_html:
God help the West, because our governments certainly won’t. The West is committing suicide through Tolerance, Equality, Progress, Inclusiveness, and Diversity.

Gun up and get ready. We’re going to have to save the West ourselves.
